results.definition: a person who does something thoughtless or annoying
examples: some joker is blocking the driveway

results.definition: a person who enjoys telling or playing jokes
an inconspicuous clause in a document or bill that affects its meaning in a way that is not immediately apparent
examples: when I demanded my money he showed me the joker in the contract

results.definition: a playing card that is usually printed with a picture of a jester
